sait.bms.problemdomain

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • sait.bms.problemdomain.Book
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChildrensBook, Cookbook, Paperback, Periodical

    public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
    Book class. Superclass for all other book types. Constructs and interacts with Book objects.
    Version:
    February 12, 2020
    Author:
    Kevin Huang 000831719

    • Constructor Detail

      • Book

        public Book(long isbn,
            java.lang.String callnum,
            int available,
            int total,
            java.lang.String title)
        Constructor for the Book class. Creates a new object with the ISBN, Call Number, Availability, Total Available, and Title.
        Parameters:
        isbn - Holds value for ISBN.
        callnum - Holds the value of the call number.
        available - Holds the books available.
        total - Holds the total amount of books.
        title - Holds the title of the book.

        Default constructor.
